highlights: Created a serverless Python and React.js web app that enables instant sharing of API tests using a centralized DynamoDB database, reducing time spent waiting for team member communication by about 3 hours per week.
Utilized user research, meetings/presentations with stakeholders, and iterative development.
Designed and developed a robust web application using Ruby on Rails to efficiently identify and display real-time information about the status of various supercomputer resources.
Implemented new features and bug fixes for OpenOndemand, an open-source web platform enabling researchers to interface with powerful linux supercomputers through a web interface.
Created the MongoDB database, Express.js API, and connecting client code for monkeytype.com, which serves over 100k unique users every day.
Identified and corrected inefficient processes, immediately reducing costs by 70 percent and slowing the rate of increasing cloud service costs.

projects.name: mathgenerator
projects.description: Created and maintain an open-source python package that enables generating a wide variety of math exercises. Featured on YC Hacker News, reaching rank 5. Has over 500 stars on Github.

projects.name: Stem Player Online
projects.description: Created a web application that enables users to creatively play music by isolating instruments from songs and giving users the power to loop, change the speed of, and add effects to their music. Used by around 3000 people per month.

projects.name: Regilo
projects.description: Created a desktop application that allows users to interfce with their computer via a custom controller sent to their phone. Uses an http and websocket server in C/C++ for maximum performance.

projects.name: 3cards
projects.description: Created a web3 application that allows users to create and share flashcard sets at 0 cost. Powered by Arweave, a decentralized blockchain-like storage network. Winner in the Arweave Open Web Hackathon.
Created a website to help people store, share, search, discuss, vote on, and manage their ideas.
projects.name: Ideaspot
Congol
projects.description: Created a website that allows users to play a version of Conway's Game of Life with 2 players competing live over the internet.

volunteer.organization: Competitive Programming Club at Ohio State
highlights: Work with team to plan weekly meetings and events, creating educational content for club members.
Lead efforts to acquire funding for the club and its various events.
